content.rendered:
Mirpur Girls’ Ideal Laboratory Institute a well-established academic centre started from Nursery to secondary classes at Mirpur of Dhaka city in 21st January, 1978. In the year 1995, the courses of English version were also introduced from play group to secondary level. Although at the beginning this institute started its journey with 2300 students and only 13 teachers, today the number of its students is more than five thousand. The students have achieved the opportunity of learning under the super-vision of 100 efficient and responsible teachers. This institute has been able to obtain the attention and appreciation of elite persons and guardians of our society because there is a disciplined and convenient environment for education. As a result every year students of this institute obtain top position in the merit list of different examination of Education Board. For the convenience of learning, there is a library with sufficient reference books, Science Lab and a modern computer Lab. Much importance is also given to the games and sports and modern Auditorium for cultural programmes and seminar meetings. This institute which is directed by an efficient governing body and experienced teachers and professors is an ideal place for any female student.

Zinat Farhana
Headmistress
Mirpur Girls’ Ideal Laboratory Institute
Mirpur-10, Dhaka-1216
